price: Barranta daga Allah da Manzon Sa zuwa ga waɗan da kuka yi wa Alkawari daga mãsu shirki*
arabic: بَرَآءَةٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦٓ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ عَٰهَدتُّم مِّنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ
footnotes: * Kãfirai iri uku ne: mãsu addinin al'ãda kamar Lãrabãwa sũ ne mãsu shirki, sa'an nan mãsu bin Littãfi shãfaffe watau Yahudu da Nasãra sa'an nan da munãfukan wannan al'umma. Ya fãra da mãsu shirki da bayãnin irin ayubansu, sa'an nan ya yi bayãnin sauran kamar haka.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: barāatun mina al-lahi warasūlihi ilā alladhīna ʿāhadttum mina al-mush'rikīna
